20101214040453.857|20101214040455.286|CCO|THE AORTA.
20101214040455.286|20101214040456.714|CCO|>> WHY DOES IT TEAR?

20101214040459.571|20101214040501.000|CCO|FACTORS FOR IT.

20101214040503.000|20101214040505.000|CCO|PRESSURE.P-
20101214040505.000|20101214040507.000|CCO|AND THAT HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE 
20101214040507.000|20101214040509.000|CCO|OVER TIME CAN SORT OF ERODE THE 
20101214040509.000|20101214040511.000|CCO|INNER LAYER OF THE AORTA.

20101214042638.059|20101214042638.647|CCO|    
20101214042638.647|20101214042639.235|CCO|    that's caused by a clot,
20101214042639.235|20101214042639.824|CCO|    
20101214042639.824|20101214042640.412|CCO|    one that could be fatal.
20101214042640.412|20101214042641.000|CCO|    But PLAVIX helps save lives.
20101214042641.000|20101214042641.588|CCO|    
20101214042641.588|20101214042642.176|CCO|          PLAVIX, taken with
20101214042642.176|20101214042642.765|CCO|    
20101214042642.765|20101214042643.353|CCO|      other heart medicines,
20101214042643.353|20101214042643.941|CCO|    
20101214042643.941|20101214042644.529|CCO|      goes beyond what other
20101214042644.529|20101214042645.118|CCO|
20101214042645.118|20101214042645.706|CCO|      heart medicines do alone,
20101214042645.706|20101214042646.294|CCO|  to provide greater protection
20101214042646.294|20101214042646.882|CCO|    
20101214042646.882|20101214042647.471|CCO|        against heart attack
20101214042647.471|20101214042648.059|CCO|    
20101214042648.059|20101214042648.647|CCO|    or stroke and even death
20101214042648.647|20101214042649.235|CCO|        
20101214042649.235|20101214042649.824|CCO|              by helping
20101214042649.824|20101214042650.412|CCO|    
20101214042650.412|20101214042651.000|CCO|    to keep blood platelets
20101214042651.000|20101214042651.714|CCO|    
20101214042651.714|20101214042652.429|CCO|      from sticking together
20101214042652.429|20101214042653.143|CCO|
20101214042653.143|20101214042653.857|CCO|    and forming dangerous clots.
20101214042653.857|20101214042654.571|CCO|        
20101214042654.571|20101214042655.286|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101214042655.286|20101214042656.000|CCO|
20101214042656.000|20101214042656.714|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101214042656.714|20101214042657.429|CCO|    
20101214042657.429|20101214042658.143|CCO|      Protection that helps
20101214042658.143|20101214042658.857|CCO|        
20101214042658.857|20101214042659.571|CCO|            save lives.
20101214042659.571|20101214042700.286|CCO|    
20101214042700.286|20101214042701.000|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101214042701.000|20101214042701.556|CCO|    
20101214042701.556|20101214042702.111|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101214042702.111|20101214042702.667|CCO|    
20101214042702.667|20101214042703.222|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101214042703.222|20101214042703.778|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101214042703.778|20101214042704.333|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101214042704.333|20101214042704.889|CCO|
20101214042704.889|20101214042705.444|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.
20101214042705.444|20101214042706.000|CCO|    
20101214042706.000|20101214042706.556|CCO|        Your doctor may use
20101214042706.556|20101214042707.111|CCO|        
20101214042707.111|20101214042707.667|CCO|          genetic tests
20101214042707.667|20101214042708.222|CCO|    
20101214042708.222|20101214042708.778|CCO|    to determine treatment.
20101214042708.778|20101214042709.333|CCO|    
20101214042709.333|20101214042709.889|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101214042709.889|20101214042710.444|CCO|
20101214042710.444|20101214042711.000|CCO|  without talking to your doctor
20101214042711.000|20101214042711.833|CCO|    as your risk of heart attack
20101214042711.833|20101214042712.667|CCO|    
20101214042712.667|20101214042713.500|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101214042713.500|20101214042714.333|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101214042714.333|20101214042715.167|CCO|
20101214042715.167|20101214042716.000|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101214042716.000|20101214042716.833|CCO|    
20101214042716.833|20101214042717.667|CCO|      should not use PLAVIX.
20101214042717.667|20101214042718.500|CCO|    
20101214042718.500|20101214042719.333|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101214042719.333|20101214042720.167|CCO|
20101214042720.167|20101214042721.000|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101214042721.000|20101214042721.556|CCO|    
20101214042721.556|20101214042722.111|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101214042722.111|20101214042722.667|CCO|
20101214042722.667|20101214042723.222|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101214042723.222|20101214042723.778|CCO|    
20101214042723.778|20101214042724.333|CCO|        so tell your doctor
20101214042724.333|20101214042724.889|CCO|    
20101214042724.889|20101214042725.444|CCO|      when planning surgery.
20101214042725.444|20101214042726.000|CCO|        
20101214042726.000|20101214042726.556|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101214042726.556|20101214042727.111|CCO|    
20101214042727.111|20101214042727.667|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101214042727.667|20101214042728.222|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101214042728.222|20101214042728.778|CCO|    
20101214042728.778|20101214042729.333|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101214042729.333|20101214042729.889|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101214042729.889|20101214042730.444|CCO|    
20101214042730.444|20101214042731.000|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101214042731.000|20101214042731.769|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101214042731.769|20101214042732.538|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
20101214042732.538|20101214042733.308|CCO|    
20101214042733.308|20101214042734.077|CCO|      a rare but potentially
20101214042734.077|20101214042734.846|CCO|
